title: Cookie Policy
intro: At DriveCore Auto, we use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content and offers.

sections.infoWeCollect: Cookies may collect technical data, usage information, and preferences to improve site functionality and your experience.
sections.howWeUse: We use cookies to optimize site performance, remember your preferences, show personalized content, and analyze traffic.
sections.sharing: We do not sell your cookie data. We may share limited anonymous data with analytics and service providers.
sections.security: Cookies are not inherently dangerous, but we implement safeguards to protect any information collected.
sections.yourRights: You may choose to disable cookies in your browser, but some features may not function properly.
sections.retention: Cookie data is retained as per legal requirements or until you delete them from your browser.
sections.thirdParties: Our site may contain third-party cookies from analytics, advertising, or embedded services.
sections.children: Our website is not intended for children under 13, and we do not knowingly collect their data.
sections.changes: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted here with a revised date.
sections.contact: For questions about our Cookie Policy, contact us at support@drivecoreauto.com.
